page.title: 12Leiston Town Council.
page.content: Leiston Town Council meet regularly every first Tuesday in the month except in August. There are fifteen members who are serving on the council this year.They elect a chair-person who a grees to stand for two years. They meet in the council offices which is situated in an old building in The Old Post Office square in the middle of Leiston.The Council discuss anything to do with the town of Leiston or its surrounding district and country matters.They deal with problems from towns people applicaions for planning and permission to build things. The town council own and manage the towns allotment,which can be rented out to people of Leiston so they can grow flowers and vegetables there.They also manage the local cinema.
